title: The Magpie Bridge
description: Sometimes what you wantDoesnâ€™t matter,Sometimes you justGotta finish what you started.Sometimes this reallyFucking sucks.But other timesYou need to take a breath And sit on the beach.A long, deep, breathTo remind you of why You signed on for this shit In the first place.This is my breath.~ Tier
author: J.A. Huss
